CustomField.label: Does Applicant qualify as a Micro Entity

value.fullName: Yes. Neither Applicant nor inventors has filed more than four (4) applications and meets gross income limit (Form PTO/SB/15A included)
value.label: Yes. Neither Applicant nor inventors has filed more than four (4) applications and meets gross income limit (Form PTO/SB/15A included)

value.fullName: Yes. Applicant is employed or has assigned to Institution of Higher Learning (Form PTO/SB/15B included)
value.label: Yes. Applicant is employed or has assigned to Institution of Higher Learning (Form PTO/SB/15B included)
